Those are all nice cards, and they're fairly priced.

And you posted scans.

And you didn't treat prospective buyers like idiots by ridiculously hyping your cards.

And you didn't cite previous "sale prices."

And you haven't bumped the thread three times in four days.

Are you sure posted these on the correct B/S/T?

Ignore this headnote - I mistakenly thought Mike P. was tooting his own horn rather than another Mike's.  My apologies.
:)!
